info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 5:04PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Deer Lodge, east central Granite and southeastern Powell Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 504 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over West Valley, or near Anaconda, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Deer Lodge, Anaconda, West Valley, Warm Springs, Galen, Lost Creek, Opportunity and Racetrack. This includes Interstate 90 between mile markers 183 and 204. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
